Dragon Tusk and Trial Cup: Stats Posted! by Steel Dragon
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Battles: Dragon Tusk and Trial Cup: Stats Posted! by Steel Dragon
By Steel Dragon on Wednesday, August 29, 2001 - 05:08 pm:

I played the game and went to both Trial Cups and the Summer Invitational(Dragon Tusk Tounament) and recorded their stats at the time that they're shown on-screen. So here they are!

Trial Cup #1:
Name:Maccam
Type:Dragon (Dragon/Dragon)
Lif:228
Pow:405
Int:302
Ski:620
Spd:211
Def:366
Holly's Comment:Now, you are about to fight a Dragon! Good Luck.
Others:Reno&Kwan

Trial Cup#2
Name:Sonmu
Type:Ape (Ape/Ape)
Lif:380
Pow:433
Int:170
Ski:168
Spd:193
Def:362
Holly's Comment:Sonmu could be a lazy monster.
Others:Suran&??????*
*Either Kwan or Riston

Dragon Tusk Tounament
Name:Megiras
Type:Laguna (Dragon/Monol)
Lif:238
Pow:385
Int:512
Ski:630
Spd:221
Def:396
Holly's Comment:Megiras is from an old family of mighty rock people....


Their you have it, hope it helps!!
